title: Add CCS logo to footer brand area with header-consistent alignment

requirements.summary: Add the existing CCS logo image to the footer left brand block and align it with the brand text similarly to the header.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer left brand area renders the image /assets/generated/ccs-logo-square.dim_1024x1024.png with appropriate alt text (e.g., "CCS Logo").
Logo + brand text are horizontally aligned and visually balanced on desktop, and remain readable and well-spaced on mobile.
No changes are required to backend behavior or data models.

file_operations.description: Update the left footer brand block to include the existing logo image at frontend/public/assets/generated/ccs-logo-square.dim_1024x1024.png with alt text "CCS Logo". requirements.summary: Ensure footer logo/brand styling is consistent with the existing design system without altering existing footer content or links.
acceptanceCriteria: All existing footer content remains present (description, quick links, contact info, social links, copyright, and caffeine.ai attribution).
Footer layout remains responsive and does not overflow or clip at common breakpoints.

file_operations.description: Adjust or extend existing global logo/brand styling (e.g., using/deriving from .logo-brand-wrapper and .logo-image) to ensure the footer brand/logo area has consistent spacing, typography alignment, and appropriate hover/focus-visible behavior on a dark footer background, without impacting other footer content.

Apply design-system-consistent Tailwind classes (spacing/typography/hover/focus-visible where applicable) to the updated footer brand/logo area so it stays responsive and visually balanced at common breakpoints, while leaving all existing footer links and text content intact.
